participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: resilient and pragmatic, with a touch of nostalgia for her past.
participant_1.background: my father is in the army. i recently was fired and had to get a new job. i work in the insurance business. my mom passed away when i was young.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: curious and intellectually inclined, with a passion for storytelling.
participant_2.background: my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i read a book every week. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i live with my husband in pennsylvania.
